message: Bob, I propose a 50/50 split of the $10,000. This seems like the fairest option to start.
Alice, I understand your starting point, but with inflation, I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.  How about a slightly adjusted split?
Bob, I see your point about inflation.  How about we meet in the middle with a split closer to the original but slightly favoring me to account for the devaluation?
